html:
{% set b = frappe.get_doc('Lab Information',{'name':doc.system_reference}) %} {% set c = frappe.get_doc('Sample Information',{'name':doc.lab_number_reference}) %}

Issue Date: {{frappe. utils. today()}}


Vet Lab
Lab Reference: {{c.name}}

Customer Information

Report Issue Date: {{frappe. utils. today()}}

TEST REPORT

The National Veterinary Laboratory was requested to perform analysis on the following sample/s:


Sample Information:
Customer Sample Reference: {{doc.lab_number_reference}}
Security Seal No.: {{b.security_seal_no}}
Sample Description: {{c.sample_description}}
Sample State on Receipt: {{b.sample_state_on_receipt}}

Sampling Information:
Officer Collecting Sample: {{b.sampling_officersender}}
Date of Sampling: {{b.sampling_date}}
Time of Sampling: {{b.sampling_time}}
Date Received: {{b.date_sample_received}}
Time Received: {{b.time_sample_received}}
No.of Sub-samples and weight: {{c.number_of_sub_samples}}, {{c.weight}}
Sample Collection Point: {{c.sample_collection_point_scp}}

Report Summary:
Analysis Information:
Start Date of Analysis: {{doc.date_started}}
End Date of Analysis: {{doc.date_finalised}}
Method Used/Method Reference: {{doc.method_used}}
Testing Laboratory: {{doc.testing_lab}}


*This method is accredited according to ISO 17025.
**This method is not accredited according to ISO 17025.
This test report may not be reproduced except in full, without written approval of the National Veterinary Laboratory.
This test report is not valid if not all pages are present.
This test report refers only to the parameters investigated on the sample mentioned in this document.
Sampling does not fall under the responsibility of the laboratory and thus results apply to the sample as received. Data in italics is that provided by the customer.
When the test report is changed, amended or re-issued, the information changed shall be underlined and the reason for change shall be included in the comments section




Issue Date: {{frappe. utils. today()}}


Vet Lab
Lab Reference: {{c.name}}

The results of the analysis requested are noted hereunder:

Kill Number Ear Tag No. Batch No Result
{{c.kill_no}} {{c.ear_tag_no}} {{c.batch_no}} {{doc.result}}

Comments:
Cut-Off Level: {{doc.cut_off_level}}


Head of Laboratory Technical Manager Principal Scientific Officer Principal Agricultural Officer


This test report shall be kept in your possession for at least 3 years.



*This method is accredited according to ISO 17025.
**This method is not accredited according to ISO 17025.
This test report may not be reproduced except in full, without written approval of the National Veterinary Laboratory.
This test report is not valid if not all pages are present.
This test report refers only to the parameters investigated on the sample mentioned in this document.
Sampling does not fall under the responsibility of the laboratory and thus results apply to the sample as received. Data in italics is that provided by the customer.
When the test report is changed, amended or re-issued, the information changed shall be underlined and the reason for change shall be included in the comments section
name: Test Report
